Title: OpenSSL: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple information disclosure vulnerabilities in OpenSSL allow
    attackers to obtain sensitive information.

Background.Text: OpenSSL is an Open Source toolkit implementing the Secure Sockets Layer (SSL v2/v3) and Transport Layer Security (TLS v1) as well as a general purpose cryptography library.

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in OpenSSL. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: Please review the referenced CVE identifiers for details.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All OpenSSL users should upgrade to the latest version:
